function.description: Carries out the Put REST request. Returns response from server.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The URL the REST can be found on.

| Option | Description | | ------------ | ----------- | | `timeout` | The processing timeout in ms (default = 5000) | | `proxyhost`| The proxy server URL | | `proxyport`| The port of the proxy server | | `user` | The user name for server authentication | | `pass` | password for server authentication | | 'insecure' | If set to true, insecure SSL connections and transfers are allowed (default = false) | | 'headers' | The object of name and value pair strings added as a parts of HTTP request header |

The body for request can be one of the following types:
* XML (XmlNode) * JSON (Object) * String [with custom content type] * REST multipart body (bodyCreate() function)
The contentType of the body that will be used.

function.longDescription:
The response.body can be one of the following types:
* XML (XmlNode) * JSON (Object) * String
The proxy and server authentication options can be combined as follows:
proxyhost proxyhost+proxyport proxyhost+proxyport+user+pass user+pass
